overview: At Webyoung we are proud to cast the newest freshest lesbian teens around. When Sammie Daniels first came to meet us we were blown away with how cute and petite she was. And on top of that she had never had lesbian sex! We had to jump on this, to see her licking ladies like a pro. To cast her alongside other budding teens was sheer delight! Once we saw Sammie seduced by her best friend Alex, we knew she’d be a heartbreaker. They’ve been best friends for years but only now were they just beginning to realize that life is what you make it, not about your reputation, and certainly not about icky boys. This, a life lesson Ariana Marie and Alina Li also know all too well.
title: She Seduced Me
